template.name: odoo_view_form
template.value: <record id="$view_xmlid$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_view_tree
template.value: <record id="$view_xml_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <tree> <field name="name"/> </tree> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_view_inherit
template.value:
<record id="$view_xmlid$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$inherit_view_xmlid$"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="$expr$" position="">
</xpath> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_action_view
template.value: $action_name$ ir.actions.act_window $model_name$ tree,form
template.description: Create new Action

template.name: odoo_menuitem_root
template.description: Create New Menu Item in the Upper bar

template.description: Create New Menu Item for Categroization

template.name: odoo_menuitem_action
template.description: Create New Menu Item for Actions

template.description: Create Nested Groups

template.name: odoo_object
template.description: Create New Odoo Object

template.description: Add new field of type Integer

template.description: Add new field of type Char

template.description: Add new field of type Text

template.description: Add new field of type Many2one

template.description: Add new field of type One2many

template.description: Add new field of type Boolean

template.description: Add new field of type HTML

template.description: Add new field of type Float

template.description: Add new field of type Date

template.description: Add new field of type DateTime

template.name: odoo_field_selection
template.description: Add new field of type Selection

template.name: odoo_field_many2many
template.value: new_field_ids = fields.Many2many(comodel_name="", relation="", column1="", column2="", string="", )
template.description: Add new field of type Many2many

template.name: odoo_security_category
template.description: Add new Security Category

template.name: odoo_security_group
template.value: <record id="" model="res.groups"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="category_id" ref=""/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> </record>
template.description: Create new Group, then assign new permissions

template.name: odoo_security_rule
template.value: <record id="" model="ir.rule"> <field name="name"></field> <field ref="model_name_of_model" name="model_id"/> <field name="domain_force">[('', '', )]</field> <field name="perm_write" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_create" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_read" eval="1"/> <field name="perm_unlink" eval="1"/> <!-- You can attach this rule to a specific group, Or make it Global --> <field name="groups" eval="[(4, ref('group_id'))]"/> <!--<field name="global" eval="1"/> --> </record>
template.description: Create new Security Rules

template.name: odoo_notebook
template.description: Add Notebook and a page

template.name: odoo_page
template.description: Add new page

template.name: odoo_field_binary
template.description: Add new field of type Binary

template.name: odoo_wkf
template.description: Add Workflow

template.name: odoo_wkf_transition
template.value: <record id="" model="workflow.transition"> <field name="act_from" ref=""/> <field name="act_to" ref=""/> <field name="signal"></field> </record>
template.description: Add new Transition to an existing Workflow

template.name: odoo_wkf_activity
template.value: <record id="" model="workflow.activity"> <field name="wkf_id" ref=""/> <!--<field name="flow_start">True</field>--> <!--<field name="flow_stop">True</field>--> <field name="name"></field> <field name="kind">function</field> <field name="action">METHOD_NAME()</field> </record>
template.description: Add new Activity

template.name: odoo_search
template.value:
<record id="$search_view_xml_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$search_view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search>
</search> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_search_inherit
template.value:
<record id="" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name"></field> <field name="model"></field> <field name="inherit_id" ref=""/> <field name="arch" type="xml">
<xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position=""> <!-- Add your fields or attributes here --> </xpath>
</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_model_import
template.value: from openerp import models, fields, api

template.name: odoo_action_wizard
template.value: <act_window id="$action_xmlid$" name="$action_name$" res_model="$res_model_name$" src_model="$src_model_name$" view_mode="form" target="new" multi="False" groups=""/>
template.description: Create a Action for wizard

template.name: odoo_view_form_wizard
template.value:
<record id="$form_view_xml_id$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$form_view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form string=""> <sheet> <group>
</group> </sheet> <footer> <button type="object" name="$button_name$" string="$button_string$" class="oe_highlight"/> <button special="cancel" string="Cancel"/> </footer> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_model_custom_report
odoo_report
template.value: <!-- string:是报表在菜单上的文字。 --> <!-- name:要写template的xmlid，8、9版本都不能省略模块名。 --> <report id="$id$" model="$model$" string="$string$" report_type="qweb-pdf" name="$name$" menu="$menu$"/>

template.name: odoo_template_report
odoo_model_inherit
template.description: Create a inherited model

template.name: odoo_template_backend_assets
template.value: <template id="assets_backend" name="$name$" inherit_id="web.assets_backend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link rel="stylesheet" href=""/> <script type="text/javascript" src=""/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: odoo_js_define
odoo_template_frontend_assets
template.value: <template id="assets_frontend" name="" inherit_id="website.assets_frontend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <script type="text/javascript" src="/website_social_china/static/src/js/baidu_share.js"></script> </xpath> </template>

template.name: odoo_view_form_smart_button_box
odoo_template_frontend_pos_assets
template.value: <template id="$id$" name="$name$" inherit_id="point_of_sale.assets"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <script type="text/javascript" src="$js_path$"/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: odoo_manifest_cnietech
template.value: { 'name': "$name$", 'version': '1.0', 'depends': [$depends$], 'author': "台州市康尼信息科技有限责任公司", 'website':"http://www.cnietech.com/", 'category': '', 'description': """ $description$ """, 'data': [], 'demo': [], }

template.name: odoo_sql_constraints
odoo_sql_constraints_with_name_and_code
template.value: _sql_constraints = [ ('name_uniq', 'unique (name)', u'$model$名称不能重复！'), ('code_uniq', 'unique (code)', u'$model$编号不能重复！'), ]

template.name: odoo_view_form_smart_button
template.value: <button type="object" name="action_view_md_sale_orders" class="oe_stat_button" icon="fa-usd"> <field string="备案" name="sale_order_count" widget="statinfo"/> </button>

template.name: odoo_view_form_debug_div
template.value:
请注意：以下内容是界面上的辅助字段。
在odoo开发者模式下，为了方便程序开发调试，这些内容能看到，正常使用时会隐藏掉。

$field_name_label$：

template.name: odoo_action_view_ids
template.value: <!--请注意：以下的tree和form的xmlid可以不带模块名--> <field name="view_ids" eval="[(5, 0, 0), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'tree', 'view_id': ref('$tree_view_xmlid$')}), (0, 0, {'view_mode': 'form', 'view_id': ref('$form_view_xmlid$')})]"/>

template.name: odoo_method_action_view_something
odoo_views_and_actions_for_new_model
template.value:
$tree_view_name$ $model_name$ $form_view_name$ $model_name$
$search_view_name$ $model_name$ $action_name$ ir.actions.act_window $model_name$ tree,form

template.name: odoo_model_new
template.description: 建一个新的model

template.name: odoo_view_form_classic
odoo_security_CRUD_groups_technical_role
template.value:
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_acl_R" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ R 组</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">10</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_acl_RU" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ RU 组</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">20</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_acl_CRUD" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ CRUD 组</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">30</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_rule_CRUD_own" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ - 记录规则 - CRUD自己的</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">40</field> </record>
<record id="group_$aggregate_name$_rule_CRUD_all" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">$model_name$ - 记录规则 - CRUD所有的</field> <field name="group_type">technical_role</field> <field name="model_aggregate_id" ref="$module_name$.aggregate_$aggregate_name$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> <field name="sequence">50</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_view_form_setting
template.value: $view_name$ $model_name$

template.name: odoo_action_setting
template.value: <record id="reception_config_settings_action" model="ir.actions.act_window"> <field name="name">接待设置</field> <field name="res_model">reception.config.settings</field> <field name="view_id" ref="view_reception_config_settings_form"/> <field name="view_mode">form</field> <field name="target">inline</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_record_sequence
template.value: <!-- todo 这个要放在noupdate="1"的data里 --> <record id="$sequence_xml_id$" model="ir.sequence"> <field name="name">$code$</field> <field name="code">$code$</field> <field name="prefix"></field> <field name="padding">4</field> </record>

template.name: odoo_name_get
odoo_default_get
odoo_unlink
odoo_wizard_get_record
odoo_view_inherit_mode_primary
template.value:
<record id="$view_xmlid$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$view_name$</field> <field name="model">$model_name$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$inherit_view_xmlid$"/> <field name="mode">primary</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="$expr$" position="">
</xpath> </field> </record>

template.name: odoo_name_search
template.value: @api.model def name_search(self, name='', args=None, operator='ilike', limit=100): args = args or [] domain = [] if name: # todo 在这里加入查询的domain # 示例 # domain = [ # "|", "|", # ("theme", operator, name), # ("date", operator, name), # ("name", operator, name) # ] domain = [$domain$] records = self.search(domain + args, limit=limit) return records.name_get()

template.name: odoo_method_create
